card.name: End of Days
card.text: Choose a nonland permanent type, then destroy all nonland permanents that aren't of the chosen type.

card.name: Prodigious Panya // Great Escapade
card.text:
Flash Flying Prodigious Panya has base power and toughness 4/4 during extra turns.
---
If it isn't an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one. (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)

prop.type: Legendary Creature — Mouse Warrior // Sorcery — Tale

card.name: Plaxolotl
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you cast a spell with a mana payment of exactly {U} this turn. The same is true for {R}. Once each turn, when you cast a blue or red instant or sorcery spell with mana value 1, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Trouble Brewing
card.text: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then exile all but one of them.

card.name: Threshing Sundew
card.text: When Threshing Sundew enters, merge up to one target creature card in your graveyard under it. Threshing Sundew has that card's abilities. When Threshing Sundew dies, return all other cards merged with it to their owner's hand.

card.name: Rainbow Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste {2}{R}{R}, Exile a multicolored card from your graveyard: Return Rainbow Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. If it's your declare attackers step, it enters attacking.

card.name: Warhound Shuja
card.text: Whenever Warhound Shuja attacks, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value less than or equal to Shuja's power from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: A Wide World Awaits
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library. You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for creature spells you cast.

card.name: Pangoling
card.text: {GU}: Pangoling gains hexproof until end of turn. {GU}: Move a counter from target creature you control onto Pangoling. {GU}: Whenever Pangoling deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card. Activate only once each turn. {1}: Pangoling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Msuji Sureshot
card.text: Protection from spells When Msuji Sureshot enters, search your library for an instant, sorcery, or Aura card that targets, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Manic River-Fishers
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever Manic River-Fishers attacks, you may search defending player's library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a name with a card in their graveyard and cast it without paying its mana cost. That player shuffles.

card.name: Frontier Savior
card.text: When Frontier Savior enters, return up to two target creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Tal, Locus Sentry
card.text: Flying When Tal, Locus Sentry enters, choose a noncreature, nonland card type. Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Will of a Fickle Lord
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, you may exile target permanent that player controls. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kambiro, the Untrue King
card.text: {WB}: Kambiro, the Untrue King gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever a storied permanent you control enters, if you cast it, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that creature's power is less than Kambiro's power, you may return it to the battlefield instead. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Take the Bait
card.text: Each player sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control and a creature with the lowest power among creatures they control.

card.name: Lunar Emissary
card.text: Flash Flying When Lunar Emissary enters, exile another target creature you control until Lunar Emissary leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Eternal Deliverance
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, their life total becomes 10.

card.name: Badru, the Skyshadow
card.text: Flying {BG}, Discard a creature card: Badru, the Skyshadow becomes a copy of the discarded card until end of turn, except he has flying and is 5/5.

card.name: The Sungaru Gang
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each creature your opponents control, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Ophidian Augury
card.text: Once each turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay the mana cost for a blue spell you cast.

card.name: Blind Blackguard
card.text: Flash Blind Blackguard can't block. When Blind Blackguard enters, target player draws a card, then reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's hand, then that player puts the chosen card on the bottom of their library.

card.name: Neural Contagion
card.text: Enchant opponent Enchanted player plays with the top card of their library revealed. You may cast the top card of enchanted player's library, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.

card.name: Flatboat Artisan // Ride the Wave
card.text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
---
Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Animorph
card.text: The owner of target creature or planeswalker shuffles it into their library, then they may create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying. If they don't, they reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a nonland permanent card, then they put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle the rest into their library.

card.name: Fume Whisperer // Brainwash
card.text:
Whenever you cast a spell that targets, Fume Whisperer gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
---
Gain control of target permanent. (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Fractured Illusion
card.text: Choose any target. Change the text of target instant or sorcery spell to "This spell deals 3 damage to the chosen target. Draw a card."

card.name: Fakadeh, Florid Queen
card.text: Flying Whenever Fakadeh, Florid Queen attacks, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with mana value 3 or less. Whenever Fakadeh deals combat damage to a player, cast any number of cards exiled with her without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Artful Chari
card.text: {1{G}W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Artful Chari. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may remove a number of +1/+1 counters from Chari equal to that spell's mana value. If you do, copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Butcher of Shallow Graves
card.text: Deathtouch Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

card.name: Raiding Gnoll-Band
card.text: Whenever an Aura you control becomes attached to a creature, choose one — • Raiding Gnoll-Band deals 3 damage to that creature. • That creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Rage of the Ravaged
card.text: Players can't gain life. Whenever a player casts a spell, Rage of the Ravaged deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Colony Queen
card.text: When Colony Queen enters, create three 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Insect tokens you control have flying and deathtouch.

card.name: Agrestal Decay
card.text: At the beginning of your first main phase, exile target card in a graveyard. If it's a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If it's a land card, add {C}. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Howling Shieldbreaker
card.text: Menace Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a permanent, if it isn't a mana ability, Howling Shieldbreaker deals 2 damage to that permanent or player.

card.name: Petrify
card.text: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent is a colorless Swamp Forest land. Whenever enchanted permanent becomes tapped, its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Thrice-Clawed Troika
card.text: Haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, create two nonlegendary token copies of Thrice-Clawed Troika. Then for each creature token created this way, create token copies of each permanent attached to Thrice-Clawed Troika and attach them to that creature token. Exile all tokens created this way at end of combat.

card.name: Berylscale Alaj
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card. Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if that card has flying, you may put a flying counter on Berylscale Alaj. Repeat this process for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Fateful Eruption
card.text: Each player sacrifices six permanents.

card.name: Lumbering Ox
card.text: Trample Lumbering Ox gets +1/+1 for each land you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may exile it and repeat this process. You may play cards exiled with Lumbering Ox.

card.name: Rumble in the Jungle
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)

card.name: Greypelt Emissary
card.text: Whenever a Hound you control is dealt damage, Greypelt Emissary deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever Greypelt Emissary attacks, you choose how target creature blocks this combat.

card.name: Triumphant Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Ruinous Naga // Spit on the Grave
card.text:
Trample Whenever a noncreature permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ruinous Naga.
---
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Spit on the Grave deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Settle the Dust
card.text: Settle the Dust deals 4 damage to each tapped creature.

card.name: Fearless King Shabil
card.text: When Fearless King Shabil enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a Cat card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. At the beginning of combat on your turn, each Cat you control gains all abilities of each other Cat you control until end of turn.

card.name: Kiana, the Unyielding
card.text: Vigilance If you would take a combat phase or a main phase, take the other instead. {UB}, Pay 1 life: Untap target creature you control.

card.name: Crashing Mammoth
card.text: Trample, haste All creatures able to block Crashing Mammoth do so.

card.name: Unlikeliest Heroes
card.text: {GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes doesn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}{GW}{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes has a +1/+1 counter on it and doesn't have vigilance, put two +1/+1 counters and a vigilance counter on it. {3}{GW}{GW}{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes has vigilance and not indestructible, put four +1/+1 counters and an indestructible counter on it.

card.name: Art of Evasion
card.text: You gain hexproof until end of turn. Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Mercurial Chameleon
card.text: {2}{GU}{GU}, {T}: Untap each non-Lizard permanent you control.

card.name: Anuran Encounters
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland permanents you control.

card.name: Anomalion
card.text: Anomalion enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{G}{W}: Permutate. (You may remove a counter from a creature you control. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on a different creature you control.)

card.name: Kalosi Invoker
card.text: Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, if you cast it from your hand, look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a multicolored card that's different colors and costs less from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Olde King Koswe
card.text: Vigilance When Olde King Koswe enters, reveal the top eight cards of your library. Put any number of permanent cards from among them onto the battlefield under an opponent's control, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target permanent you own.

card.name: Am'atambi, Fable Weaver
card.text: At the beginning of each other player's upkeep, draw a card, then discard a card unless you have Am'atambi, Fable Weaver deal 3 damage to you. You may reveal creature cards as you draw them. Once each turn, when you reveal a creature card this way, you may pay {3}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 3/3.

card.name: An'yama, Elder Guardian
card.text: If another multicolored card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere other than your hand or library, if no cards exiled with An'yama, Elder Guardian are exactly that card's colors, you may instead exile that card and put a +1/+1 counter on An'yama. As long as An'yama has four or more counters on them, they have protection from everything.

card.name: Aparodist
card.text: As Aparodist enters, choose a non-Human creature type. Aparodist is the chosen type in addition to its other types. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control of the chosen type.

card.name: Canid Simulacrum
card.text: Canid Simulacrum enters with each counter on it from among +1/+1, flying, first strike, deathtouch, lifelink, menace, reach, shield, trample, and vigilance. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) Whenever a creature you control enters, move two random counters from Canid Simulacrum onto that creature.

card.name: Vast Savannah
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W}. {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Vast Savannah: Search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Gleaming River
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U}. {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Gleaming River: Search your library for an Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Murky Peat
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}. {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Murky Peat: Search your library for a Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Sunwashed Spires
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Sunwashed Spires: Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Tropical Grove
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}. {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Tropical Grove: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Greypelt Initiate
card.text: Whenever another Hound you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Greypelt Initiate.

card.name: Bourasan Street Watch
card.text: Whenever Bourasan Street Watch attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, Bourasan Street Watch gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Mythos Scribe
card.text: When Mythos Scribe enters, you may return target storied card from your graveyard to your hand. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Batiga Escort
card.text: When Batiga Escort enters, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. {2}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with flying.

card.name: T'nege, Skyguard
card.text: Flying When T'nege, Skyguard enters, exile another target creature you control until T'nege leaves the battlefield. If you do, exile target creature an opponent controls until T'nege leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Beyond the Boneyard
card.text: When Beyond the Boneyard enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Beyond the Boneyard leaves the battlefield. Your opponents can't cast spells that share a card type with the exiled card during postcombat main phases.

card.name: Shabil's Absolute Triumph
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Provincial Loyalty
card.text: When Provincial Loyalty enters, put a vigilance counter on each of up to two target creatures you control. At the beginning of combat on your turn, permutate. (You may remove a counter from a creature you control. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on a different creature you control.)

card.name: Nectarkin
card.text: Flying Nectarkin enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Nectarkin deals combat damage to a player, permutate. (You may remove a counter from a creature you control. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on a different creature you control.)

card.name: Serum Smoker
card.text: Whenever you cast a Tale, exile target creature an opponent controls until its owner pays {2}. (It enters under its owner's control.)

card.name: Aether Sculptor // Sentient Steel
card.text:
When Aether Sculptor enters, create a tapped colorless artifact token named Lotus Petal with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
---
Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 0/0 artifact creature. Put three +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Sage of Storms
card.text: Flying When Sage of Storms enters, untap another target creature you control with flying and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Arcane Refusal
card.text: Counter target spell. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one on top and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Into Waridi Valley
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each multicolored card in your graveyard. Draw four cards.

card.name: On Marvelous Wings
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Tanager Typhoon
card.text: Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, exile target nonland permanent, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

card.name: Pakka, the Shadowcloak // Conclusion
card.text:
Whenever a creature dies, Pakka, the Shadowcloak deals 1 damage to each opponent.
---
Destroy target creature. (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)

prop.type: Legendary Creature — Cat Rogue // Sorcery — Tale

card.name: Pestilent Vermin
card.text: When Pestilent Vermin enters, target opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. Whenever you cast a Tale, you may return Pestilent Vermin from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Shrieking Gnoll
card.text: Lifelink Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Shrieking Gnoll, put a +1/+1 counter on Shrieking Gnoll, then target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Shrieking Gnoll.

card.name: Hero Slayer
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a storied permanent you control enters, remove up to two counters from target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Stygian Condor
card.text: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Twilight Ambush
card.text: Destroy target creature with power or toughness 2 or less.

card.name: Pact of Dark Power
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and indestructible. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)

card.text:
Haste
---
Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Thorny Bushwacker
card.text: Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Thorny Bushwacker has base power and toughness 5/3 until end of turn.

card.name: Quill Sniper
card.text: {T}: Quill Sniper deals 1 damage to any target if it's an opponent or if you control a storied permanent. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: The Harnessing of Fire
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Mwiti, Ever-Scarred
card.text: Menace Other attacking Hounds you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Vibrant Flames
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a multicolored card from your graveyard or pay {2}. Vibrant Flames deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Canine Acumen
card.text: You may cast this spell with no targets for {2}{R}. If you do, as it resolves, create a 1/1 red Hound creature token, then attach Canine Acumen to that token. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike.

card.name: Calamity of Yore
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Babyscale Bruiser
card.text: When Babyscale Bruiser enters, you may reveal a creature card from your hand. If you do, Babyscale Bruiser deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the revealed card's power. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Babyscale Bruiser.

card.name: Coldblood Bender
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.

card.name: Battle for Msuji Highlands
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Grotto Scarab
card.text: When Grotto Scarab enters, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens for each creature you controlled that died this turn.

card.name: Lair Recluse
card.text: Lair Recluse enters with a vigilance counter and a reach counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, permutate. (You may remove a counter from a creature you control. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on a different creature you control.)

card.name: Rains Bring New Life
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Join the Colony
card.text: Choose two. You may choose the same mode twice — • Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Theurgic Flock
card.text: Flying Whenever Theurgic Flock deals combat damage to a player, if it doesn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Darkwing Wretch // Easy Peckings
card.text:
Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have at least two more cards in hand than any opponent, scry 1.
---
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Back-Alley Gnoll
card.text: First strike Back-Alley Gnoll has lifelink as long as it's enchanted by a black Aura. Back-Alley Gnoll gets +2/+0 as long as it's enchanted by a red Aura.

card.name: Trials of Ndengo
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

card.name: Kutaan Incubation
card.text: Create three 1/1 green Insect creature tokens, then put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.

card.name: Milunda, Prairie Prince
card.text: Lifelink When Milunda, Prairie Prince enters, each opponent loses life equal to the number of storied permanents you control and you gain that much life. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Parrot Pools
card.text: Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. It gains haste until end of turn. Whenever three or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Chitterrax // Brood Spawn
card.text:
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chitterrax, then each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.text: Other Hounds you control get +1/+1.

card.text:

card.name: Tawny Prophet
card.text: Flying Tawny Prophet enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. {WU}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Tawny Prophet: Scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Reticulate Chemist
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast a Tale, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the other back on top or into your graveyard.

card.name: Kafyabari Enforcer
card.text: Haste Whenever another creature you control dies, you may return an Aura that was attached to that creature to the battlefield attached to Kafyabari Enforcer.

card.name: Savannah Huntsman
card.text: When Savannah Huntsman enters, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of counters among permanents you control.

card.name: Primation
card.text: Distribute a vigilance, trample, first strike, and lifelink counter among up to four target creatures you control, then distribute four +1/+1 counters among those creatures.

card.name: Netherform
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If that permanent is storied, Netherform becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant permanent. Attach it to that permanent. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.) Enchanted permanent has indestructible.

card.name: Wisdom Beyond Age
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one, put one into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your library. Wisdom Beyond Age deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the exiled card's mana value.

card.name: Fester Swarm
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a rot counter on Fester Swarm and you gain 1 life. {B}{G}, Remove two or more rot counters from Fester Swarm: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it for each rot counter removed this way.

card.name: Umala, the Reverent
card.text: Other Hounds you control have trample. {RW}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Hound you control.

card.name: Ornery Bloom
card.text: Draw two cards. Create a tapped colorless artifact token named Lotus Petal with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Runescale Brawler
card.text: Runescale Brawler enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Runescale Brawler while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from Runescale Brawler.

card.name: Bwema, the Ruthless
card.text: Bwema, the Ruthless enters with your choice of two different counters on it from among menace, first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.

card.name: Sheltered Diviner // Just Resting
card.text:
When Sheltered Diviner enters, each player mills three cards.

Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Azure Caterwauler
card.text: Flying, trample Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Azure Caterwauler.

card.name: Msuji Operative
card.text: Menace Whenever Msuji Operative deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library, put it into your hand, then you lose life equal to its mana value unless you discard a card.

card.name: Pith Wilt
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors among spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Oozing Adder
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Oozing Adder attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls block it this combat if able.

card.name: Virtuorangutan // Birdsong
card.text:
Trample Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Virtuorangutan.

card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)

card.name: Explore Forgotten Lands
card.text: Mill five cards, then return up to one creature card, up to one land card, and up to one noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Explore Forgotten Lands.

card.name: Guide to the Wayward
card.text: Guide to the Wayward enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1{W}U}, {T}: Permutate. (You may remove a counter from a creature you control. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on a different creature you control.)

card.name: Shrewd Sikoyo
card.text: Shrewd Sikoyo can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater. Shrewd Sikoyo gets +1/+0 as long as you have at least two more cards in hand than any opponent.

card.name: Feline Furor
card.text: Enchant creature When Feline Furor enters, it deals 2 damage to enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has menace.

card.name: Sirif of the Lord's Legion
card.text: Whenever Sirif of the Lord's Legion attacks, you may put a lore counter on target Saga you control. Whenever Sirif deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a lore counter from target Saga you control.

card.name: Homestead
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a crop counter on Homestead. {GW}, Remove a crop counter from Homestead: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {GW}, Remove three crop counters from Homestead: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: The Banishment of Seh'a
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
